txt.en: 'You have decided to help me? Excellent. There is a draught I know the making of that should cleanse the taint from the ruins of Dol Ringwest. I have most of the ingredients I need, but there is one remaining herb -- a fragrant herb that grows on the shores of the river, running north to south below Duillond.\n\n'Tis a simple matter to gather it, and I would do so myself, but the brewing is at a delicate stage right now, and I must keep a close eye upon it. Would you gather the herbs I need, [placeholder]?'
'Ah! There, just in time. The last step of the process is to add the herbs you have collected for me. After that it simply needs to steep for a few minutes, and the draught will be complete.'
'You will find that the herb grows on the shores of the river below Duillond running north to south.'
'The draught is still brewing, but I will soon need to infuse it with the herbs I sent you for.'
Calengil has asked you to collect some herbs for him as part of a draught he is creating to cleanse a dark taint from the ruins near Duillond.
The herbs can be found along the riverside beneath Duillond. \n\nCalengil has asked you to retrieve the herbs that he needs to complete the cleansing draught.
Return the herbs you collected to Calengil
Calengil is at Duillond, north of Celondim.\n\nYou should return the herbs you collected to Calengil.
